entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning Network
entry.summary: Satoshi Nakamoto has hailed the Lightning Network as a significant achievement for global business transactions with fast and secure lightning payments. He created a new lightning address, satoshi@vistomail.com, and praised the network's ability to process more transactions per second than any financial instrument. Bitcoin is considered a massive success and will continue to scale. However, there are concerns about Vistomail's recent ownership change, leading to suggestions that the entire domain should be blocked from the list to prevent scammers pretending to be Satoshi.
